get.summary: Get the list of accessible processes.
Get information about the specified process.

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: Process ID used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The Runtime instance cookie used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Process name used to identify the target process.

get.summary: Get the environment block of the specified process.

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: Process ID used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The Runtime instance cookie used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Process name used to identify the target process.

get.summary: Capture a dump of a process.

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: Process ID used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The Runtime instance cookie used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Process name used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of dump to capture.

parameters.name: egressProvider
parameters.description: The egress provider to which the dump is saved.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An optional set of comma-separated identifiers users can include to make an operation easier to identify.

get.summary: Capture a GC dump of a process.

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: Process ID used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The Runtime instance cookie used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Process name used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: egressProvider
parameters.description: The egress provider to which the GC dump is saved.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An optional set of comma-separated identifiers users can include to make an operation easier to identify.

get.summary: Capture a trace of a process.

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: Process ID used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The Runtime instance cookie used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Process name used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: profile
parameters.description: The profiles enabled for the trace session.

parameters.name: durationSeconds
parameters.description: The duration of the trace session (in seconds).

parameters.name: egressProvider
parameters.description: The egress provider to which the trace is saved.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An optional set of comma-separated identifiers users can include to make an operation easier to identify.

post.summary: Capture a trace of a process.

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: Process ID used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The Runtime instance cookie used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Process name used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: durationSeconds
parameters.description: The duration of the trace session (in seconds).

parameters.name: egressProvider
parameters.description: The egress provider to which the trace is saved.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An optional set of comma-separated identifiers users can include to make an operation easier to identify.

requestBody.description: The trace configuration describing which events to capture.

parameters.description: The duration of the logs session (in seconds).

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The level of the logs to capture.

parameters.name: egressProvider
parameters.description: The egress provider to which the logs are saved.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An optional set of comma-separated identifiers users can include to make an operation easier to identify.

get.summary: Get a list of the current backlog of metrics for a process in the Prometheus exposition format.
Gets the operations list for the specified process (or all processes if left unspecified).

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: Process ID used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The Runtime instance cookie used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Process name used to identify the target process.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An optional set of comma-separated identifiers users can include to make an operation easier to identify.

stateReason.description: Human-readable explanation for the current state of the collection rule.
Human-readable explanation for the current state of the collection rule.

lifetimeOccurrences.description: The number of times the trigger has executed for a process in its lifetime.

slidingWindowOccurrences.description: The number of times the trigger has executed for a process in the current sliding window duration (as defined by Limits).

actionCountLimit.description: The number of times the trigger can execute for a process before being limited (as defined by Limits).

actionCountSlidingWindowDurationLimit.description: The sliding window duration in which the actionCountLimit is the maximum number of occurrences (as defined by Limits).

slidingWindowDurationCountdown.description: The amount of time that needs to pass before the slidingWindowOccurrences drops below the actionCountLimit

ruleFinishedCountdown.description: The amount of time that needs to pass before the rule is finished

diagnosticPortName.description: The name of the named pipe or unix domain socket to use for connecting to the diagnostic server.

filterSpecs.description: The logger categories and levels at which logs are collected. Setting the log level to null will have logs collected from the corresponding category at the level set in the LogLevel property.

useAppFilters.description: Set to true to collect logs at the application-defined categories and levels.

OperationProcessInfo.description: Represents the details of a given process used in an operation.

OperationStatus.description: Represents the state of a long running operation. Used for all types of results, including successes and failures.

OperationSummary.description: Represents a partial model when enumerating all operations.
